verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> season <S%G2540><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the report <S%G189><s%> concerning Jesus <S%G2424><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G3816><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G3816><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%>; he <S%G846><s%> is risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> do <S%G5124><s%> these powers <S%G1754><s%> work <S%G1411><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> had laid hold on <S%G2902><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, and bound <S%G1210><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> him in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sake <S%G2266><s%> of Herodias <S%G846><s%>, his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>'s wife <S%G1135><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, It is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> her <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2309><s%> he <S%G846><s%> would have <S%G2309><s%> put him to death <S%G615><s%>, he feared <S%G5399><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they counted <S%G2192><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

But when <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%>'s birthday <S%G1077><s%> came <S%G71><s%>, the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Herodias <S%G2266><s%> danced <S%G3738><s%> in the <S%G3319><s%> midst <S%G1722><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pleased <S%G700><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%>.
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> he promised <S%G3670><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an oath <S%G3727><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> her <S%G846><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> she <S%G1437><s%> should ask <S%G154><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> she <S%G4264><s%>, being put forward by <S%G5259><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, saith <S%G5346><s%>, Give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a platter <S%G4094><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> was grieved <S%G3076><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sake <S%G3727><s%> of his oaths <S%G2532><s%>, and of them that sat at meat <S%G4873><s%> with him <S%G2753><s%>, he commanded it to be given <S%G1325><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> and beheaded <S%G607><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the prison <S%G5438><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> was brought <S%G5342><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a platter <S%G4094><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to the damsel <S%G2877><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> she brought <S%G5342><s%> it to <S%G3384><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%>, and took up <S%G142><s%> the corpse <S%G4983><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> buried <S%G2290><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G2064><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Now when <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it <S%G402><s%>, he withdrew from thence <S%G1564><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G2596><s%> boat <S%G4143><s%>, to a <S%G2596><s%> desert <S%G2048><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> apart <S%G2398><s%>: and when <S%G2532><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> thereof <S%G190><s%>, they followed him <S%G846><s%> on foot <S%G3979><s%> from the cities <S%G4172><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> came forth <S%G1831><s%>, and saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he had compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> healed <S%G2323><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sick <S%G732><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when even <S%G3798><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> come <S%G846><s%>, the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, The place <S%G5117><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> desert <S%G2048><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the time <S%G5610><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> past <S%G3928><s%>; send <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away <S%G630><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may <S%G59><s%> go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the villages <S%G2968><s%>, and buy <S%G59><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> food <S%G1033><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, They <S%G2192><s%> have no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> to go away <S%G565><s%>; give <S%G1325><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, We have <S%G2192><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> but <S%G1487><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> fishes <S%G2486><s%>.
And he said <S%G2036><s%>, Bring <S%G5342><s%> them <S%G846><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2753><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> to sit down <S%G347><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G740><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G740><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> fishes <S%G2486><s%>, and looking up <S%G308><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, he blessed <S%G2127><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brake <S%G2806><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> the loaves <S%G740><s%> to <S%G3101><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> ate <S%G5315><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were filled <S%G5526><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they took up <S%G142><s%> that which remained <S%G4052><s%> over of the broken pieces <S%G2801><s%>, twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> full <S%G4134><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they that did eat <S%G2068><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> five thousand <S%G4000><s%> men <S%G435><s%>, besides <S%G5565><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> children <S%G3813><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> constrained <S%G315><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> to enter <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to go before <S%G4254><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the other side <S%G4008><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> he <S%G3739><s%> should send <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away <S%G630><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> after he had sent <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away <S%G630><s%>, he went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%> apart <S%G2398><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%>: and when <S%G1161><s%> even was <S%G2258><s%> come <S%G1096><s%>, he was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> in the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%>, distressed <S%G928><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the waves <S%G2949><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> contrary <S%G1727><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> in the fourth <S%G5067><s%> watch <S%G5438><s%> of the night <S%G3571><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, walking <S%G4043><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>.

And when <S%G2532><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, they were troubled <S%G5015><s%>, saying <S%G3754><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> a ghost <S%G5326><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they cried out <S%G2896><s%> for <S%G575><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> Be of good cheer <S%G2293><s%>; it is <S%G1510><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>; be <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> it be <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>, bid <S%G2753><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the waters <S%G5204><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%>, and walked <S%G4043><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the waters <S%G5204><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when he saw <S%G991><s%> the <S%G2478><s%> wind <S%G417><s%>, he was afraid <S%G5399><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> beginning <S%G756><s%> to sink <S%G2670><s%>, he cried <S%G2896><s%> out <S%G3004><s%>, saying, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, save <S%G4982><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stretched forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%>, and took hold <S%G1949><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, O thou of little faith <S%G1519><s%>, wherefore <S%G5101><s%> didst thou doubt <S%G1365><s%>?
And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> were gone <S%G1684><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%>, the wind <S%G417><s%> ceased <S%G2869><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they that were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Of a truth <S%G230><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had crossed over <S%G1276><s%>, they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%>, unto Gennesaret <S%G1082><s%>.

And when <S%G2532><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> of <S%G1921><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> knew <S%G1921><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, they sent into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> region round about <S%G4066><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> that were <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> they besought <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might <S%G680><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> the border <S%G2899><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> were made whole <S%G1295><s%>.
